statements: UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_consumed = 150.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE energy_consumption SET resource_type = 'Electricity' , timestamp = '2022-05-10 08:30:00' WHERE appliance_name = 'Refrigerator';
UPDATE energy_consumption SET energy_consumed = 150.5, timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE energy_consumption SET appliance_name = 'Washing Machine', resource_type = 'Electricity' WHERE id = 5
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET consumed_units = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ResourceConservation SET resource_type = 'Water' , saved_units = 100 WHERE building_name = 'Office Building A';
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET consumed_units = 1500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ResourceConservation SET saved_units = 50.75, building_name = 'Resource Center' WHERE resource_type = 'Water';
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET electricity_consumption = 500 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE ResourceConsumption SET resource_amount = 1000 WHERE resource_id = 3;
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET electricity_consumption = 1500, water_consumption = 200 WHERE location_id = 1;
UPDATE ResourceConsumption SET resource_amount = 500 WHERE resource_id = 3;
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET energy_usage = 50.5 WHERE appliance_id = 1;
UPDATE ConservationAreas SET conservation_status = true WHERE area_id = 2;
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET energy_usage = 150.5 WHERE timestamp = '2022-07-15' AND appliance_id = 3;
UPDATE ResourceConsumption SET usage_amount = 75.3, timestamp = '2022-09-20' WHERE device_id = 5 AND resource_type = 'Electricity';
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET energy_usage = 150 WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE ConservationAreas SET sensor_id = 2 WHERE conservation_id = 3;
UPDATE EnergyConsumption SET energy_usage = energy_usage + 5 WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE ResourceConsumption SET quantity_used = quantity_used * 1.5 WHERE resource_id = 2;
